## FormsModule class

The starting point or boot-strap of a FutureForms application

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FormsModule 
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)()](./forms42core.formsmodule._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>FormsModule</code> class |

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultFlushStrategy](./forms42core.formsmodule.defaultflushstrategy.md) | <code>static</code> | [FlushStrategy](./forms42core.flushstrategy.md) | Flush when leaving row or block |
|  [showurl](./forms42core.formsmodule.showurl.md) | <code>static</code> | boolean | Whether or not to display the active form in the url |
